attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those on benifits are most in need of loans; but because of benifits will never have any cash to repay loans. They then get into all sorts of difficulties..eg. shark loans etc.; The idea is a radical method to repay loans with out effecting benifits; employment; pensions etc.; Loans made availble are repaid by 'loan work'. 60 hours of 'loan work' would repay £400 at £5.73 an hour.; 'Loan work' would not effect benifits; pensions or employment.; Providers of 'loan work' could be given bounties or sweetners if permanent work is a result.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
